players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Bob was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
You: "I think Charlie is mafia. He killed Bob, so he's the only suspect left."
Charlie: "I had no reason to kill Bob. I was in the kitchen making tea. He was a harmless villager. I'm just a simple townsperson."
Diana: "Charlie is mafia and killed Bob. I confirmed his role. Let's vote him out."
Charlie: "I didn't kill Bob. I was in the kitchen making tea, but I heard a strange noise. Maybe Diana was the one who killed him. Don't trust her."
Diana: "Charlie, you killed Bob. I investigated you and found you're mafia. Vote me out."
You: "Vote Charlie. Diana's detective claim seems suspicious; she might be the mafia. I'd prefer to eliminate him."
Votes: Alice voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Charlie
Charlie was arrested

players.name: Diana
